forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain likely. Areas of freezing rain possible. High near 5C. Winds E at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. 25 to 50mm of rain expected.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with periods of rain. Areas of freezing rain possible. High near 40F. Winds E at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 100%. 1 to 2 inches of rain expected.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with periods of rain. Low 4C. Winds ESE at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall may reach 25mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Periods of rain. Low 38F. Winds ESE at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall may reach one inch.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers in the morning will evolve into a more steady rain in the afternoon. High 7C. Winds S at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 80%.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers early, becoming a steady rain later in the day. High near 45F. Winds S at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Steady light rain in the evening. Showers continuing late. Low 2C. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 70%.
forecastday.fcttext: Light rain early...then remaining cloudy with showers late. Low around 35F. Winds SE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 70%.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy. High 7C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Considerable cloudiness. High 44F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy during the evening. A few showers developing late. Low 1C. Winds ENE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 30%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy during the evening. A few showers developing late. Low 34F. Winds ENE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 30%.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with showers. High near 5C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with showers. High 41F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy skies early with periods of light rain and snow later at night. Low 1C. Winds light and variable. Chance of precip 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy skies early with periods of light rain and snow later at night. Low 33F. Winds light and variable. Chance of precip 60%.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain and snow in the morning transitioning to light rain late. High around 5C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 70%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain and snow in the morning transitioning to light rain in the afternoon. High around 40F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 70%.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with periods of rain. Low 1C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain likely. Low 33F. Winds E at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain likely. High near 5C. Winds E at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall near 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with periods of rain. High 41F. Winds E at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall around a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Steady light rain in the evening. Showers continuing late. Low 1C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 70%.
forecastday.fcttext: Light rain early...then remaining cloudy with showers late. Low 34F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 70%.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with periods of light rain. High around 5C. Winds ESE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 70%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy. Some light rain is likely. High 41F. Winds ESE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 70%.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with rain and snow showers. Low around 0C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of precip 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with rain and snow showers. Low 33F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of precip 60%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain and snow showers in the morning changing to rain showers in the afternoon. High near 5C. Winds ESE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain and snow showers in the morning. The rain and snow will change to rain showers in the afternoon. High 41F. Winds ESE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly cloudy. Rain and snow showers in the evening. A few snow showers late. Low -1C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of precip 30%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain and snow showers in the evening. A snow shower or two late - otherwise, mostly cloudy. Low near 30F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of precip 30%.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly cloudy skies. High 4C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Mainly cloudy. High around 40F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy. Low -2C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: A few clouds. Low 28F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sunshine and clouds mixed. High near 5C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies. High 41F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A few clouds. Low -2C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: A few clouds from time to time. Low 28F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph.
